text: is a Japanese football player for Veertien Mie. ==Career== After attending Osaka University of Health and Sport Sciences, Ota joined Grulla Morioka in January 2018.http://grulla-morioka.jp/tab02_team/180109news_002/ ==Club statistics== Updated to February 2nd, 2020.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 271 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
